name: data_folder
description: path to the data folder used to store experiments

name: rail_length
description: Distance between the center of the basket in its two extreme positions

name: dist_origin_rails
description: Distance between the origin of the camera window and the origin of the rails

name: motor_max_acceleration
description: Maximum angular acceleration of the motor

name: inc_m_ratio
description: Number of coder increments per translation meter of the basket

name: pwm_incs_ratio
description: PWM value relative to speed in inc per second
